0.1.name: wordpress/poker-rakeback-calculator-widget
0.1.description:
Usually, the reason why the rakeback calculator is so important is because of several reasons. The first and foremost reason is that the rakeback calculator swiftly calculates the amount of rake back that would be provided to each player.

First of all, it should be cleared that the rakeback is not a fixed amount, but is a fixed percentage that is provided to players on the amount they lose. Therefore, you would need the rake back calculator in order to calculate the amount of rakeback for each player, because not all players go down with the same amount of losses.

You need to make sure that the rakeback calculator is precisely set, because if it has some issues that need to be ironed out, then the rakeback calculator could cause a severe amount of damage to your online poker business. There are a lot of places from which you can get a good rakeback calculator, and if you want to, you can easily search the internet and find the best rakeback calculators that you can o
